Field Detail

All

static ProgramOptions All
Used to manipulate Options as a group.

DEBUG

static final ProgramOptions.Option DEBUG
Enables certain debug output. There are many other verbosity options. See the Debug*Listeners in the util package, in particular.

DOMAIN_ID

static final ProgramOptions.Option DOMAIN_ID
Specifies domain ID for participant (0 by default).

UDP

static final ProgramOptions.Option UDP
Specifies whether UDP should be used as a transport.

SHMEM

static final ProgramOptions.Option SHMEM
Specifies whether shared memory should be used as a transport.

BASE_DIRECTORY

static final ProgramOptions.Option BASE_DIRECTORY
Root directory from which to publish files.

RECURSE_SUBDIRECTORIES

static final ProgramOptions.Option RECURSE_SUBDIRECTORIES
Determines whether the files in subdirectories will be published or not.

RESEND_MODIFIED_FILES

static final ProgramOptions.Option RESEND_MODIFIED_FILES
If true, files modified after transfer will be resent. Note that a new reader will always cause all files to be resent anyway.

TOPIC

static final ProgramOptions.Option TOPIC
Specifies topic string.

QUEUE_SIZE

static final ProgramOptions.Option QUEUE_SIZE
Size of file segment blocking queue lying between Segmenter and WriteThread.

INCLUDE_FILTER

static final ProgramOptions.Option INCLUDE_FILTER
Regular expression specifying files to be included. Overrides exclude filter.

EXCLUDE_FILTER

static final ProgramOptions.Option EXCLUDE_FILTER
Regular expression specifying files to be excluded.

ASYNC_PUB

static final ProgramOptions.Option ASYNC_PUB
Enables default asynchronous publication.

SEND_RATE

static final ProgramOptions.Option SEND_RATE
Send rate (implies asynchronous publication). Units are messages per second for shared memory, Mb per second for UDP.

LOG_LEVEL

static final ProgramOptions.Option LOG_LEVEL
Log Level as a string. See java.util.logging.Logger

FAKE_READ

static final ProgramOptions.Option FAKE_READ
If true, data from files is ignored and generated content sent instead. The file is still accessed to read metadata.

DDS_QSIZE

static final ProgramOptions.Option DDS_QSIZE
Size of sample queue lying between WriteThread and DDS.

TPT_QSIZE

static final ProgramOptions.Option TPT_QSIZE
Size of transmit transport buffers.

PUSH_DATA

static final ProgramOptions.Option PUSH_DATA
Specifies whether the DataWriter should put data on the wire upon write(), or let the Reader request missing samples as needed.

FileSegmentPublisher.Opt

FileSegmentPublisher.Opt()
